titles.flashcardsSetTitle: Title of the set of flashcards
titles.reportWordErrorToAuthor: Report an error in this word to the author
titles.reportWordToAdmin: Report this word to the administration

contents.registerUsernameDesc: It's your username, visible for other users. Remember: Your username should be unique.
contents.registerEmailDesc: It's your email address. This one isn't visible for other users. By this one you can confirm your register and sign in
contents.registerPasswordDesc: Remember! Password should be secure. Minimum 8 characters, small and big letter, numbers etc.

registerFooterInfo.content: If you have account, you can log in

loginFooterInfo.content: If you don't have account, you should

contents.flashcardsTitleDesc: This field must have between 2 and 28 letters.
contents.nameColumnDesc: This field must have between 2 and 20 letters.
contents.flashcardsCreatorDesc: Welcome to the creator of flashcards. You can make new flashcards here. How long will it take? Only 30 seconds! Yes, that fast! And after made this one, you can start learning.
contents.emptyFlashcards: You don't have any flashcards yet
contents.changePasswordDesc: Your password should be secure and strong. Password should be changing so often.
contents.emailPrivacyDesc: You can choose, if you want other users to see your email address. By default this option is turned off.
contents.loginByUsernameDesc: Turn on login using your username. You can concurentlly use email address or username to login. By default this option is turned off.

flashcardsIntroduce.title: It's your first set of flashcards!
flashcardsIntroduce.content: Hello! I see that you created your fist set of flashcards. Here you can expand your vocabulary and learn anywhen you want. How?

flashcardsIntroduce.title: Adding new words
flashcardsIntroduce.content: Every your set of flashcards has two fields in which you can enter your words and add this ones. You can confirm adding words by little button beside second field or by click enter.

flashcardsIntroduce.title: Time for learn!
flashcardsIntroduce.content: When you collect enough words, you should try our little games to learn it! This will help you in remember a lot of words!
